MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of Sutton Manor, affecting properties in Tennyson Street. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 7:46PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:53PM on Saturday 5th December 2020
